isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - POWER DISTRIBUTION & GROUND SYSTEM - OPERATION - Ignition Power

svcproc.title: Ignition Power
svcproc.para: Battery power from the B1 battery stud is applied to the common terminal (30) of the ignition relay and to the keyswitch "B" terminal. Refer to 12V POWER DISTRIBUTION - IGNITION circuit diagram in CTS-5119S. With the key switch in the ON position, power from the key switch "I" terminal energizes the Ignition relay, applying power to the ignition adapters and fuses. With the key switch in the Start or Ignition position, power is present at the "I" terminal.
